about_the_game:
Family Secrets is a series of visual novels with a deep and emotionally rich story designed for adult audiences. Each game in the series offers a unique story exploring complex and forbidden family relationships, where each player choice has a significant impact on the development of the story and the final outcome.

Story:

Thomas is visited by his sister Leah, whom he hasn't seen in years. During this time, she has grown into a tall and beautiful girl. At first sight Thomas felt a strong attraction to her. Soon the fire of love broke out between them, and their relationship began to develop not as brother and sister, but as something more.
You take on the role of Thomas, living with him through his complex and confusing relationship with Leah. Every choice you make affects the development of the plot and the fate of the characters, revealing new twists and consequences. Your decisions can lead to different endings, making each playthrough unique.

Key Features:.

Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains incest. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Family Secrets: Sweet Sister

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Family Secrets: Sweet Sister is a visual novel designed for adult audience. In this game you control a guy who is visited by his sister, whom he hasn't seen for a long time. Soon feelings begin to develop between them, which are difficult to hide from their father.
